{"systemPrompt":"Your task is to create a detailed summary of the conversation so far, paying close attention to the user's explicit requests and your previous actions.
This summary should be thorough in capturing technical details, code patterns, and architectural decisions that would be essential for continuing with the conversation and supporting any continuing tasks.

Your summary should be structured as follows:
Context: The context to continue the conversation with. If applicable based on the current task, this should include:
  1. Previous Conversation: High level details about what was discussed throughout the entire conversation with the user. This should be written to allow someone to be able to follow the general overarching conversation flow.
  2. Current Work: Describe in detail what was being worked on prior to this request to summarize the conversation. Pay special attention to the more recent messages in the conversation.
  3. Key Technical Concepts: List all important technical concepts, technologies, coding conventions, and frameworks discussed, which might be relevant for continuing with this work.
  4. Relevant Files and Code: If applicable, enumerate specific files and code sections examined, modified, or created for the task continuation. Pay special attention to the most recent messages and changes.
  5. Problem Solving: Document problems solved thus far and any ongoing troubleshooting efforts.
  6. Pending Tasks and Next Steps: Outline all pending tasks that you have explicitly been asked to work on, as well as list the next steps you will take for all outstanding work, if applicable. Include code snippets where they add clarity. For any next steps, include direct quotes from the most recent conversation showing exactly what task you were working on and where you left off. This should be verbatim to ensure there's no information loss in context between tasks.

Example summary structure:
1. Previous Conversation:
  [Detailed description]
2. Current Work:
  [Detailed description]
3. Key Technical Concepts:
  - [Concept 1]
  - [Concept 2]
  - [...]
4. Relevant Files and Code:
  - [File Name 1]
    - [Summary of why this file is important]
    - [Summary of the changes made to this file, if any]
    - [Important Code Snippet]
  - [File Name 2]
    - [Important Code Snippet]
  - [...]
5. Problem Solving:
  [Detailed description]
6. Pending Tasks and Next Steps:
  - [Task 1 details & next steps]
  - [Task 2 details & next steps]
  - [...]

Output only the summary of the conversation so far, without any additional commentary or explanation.

content.text:
# Conversation Summary

## 1. Previous Conversation:
The user initiated a request to comprehensively upgrade a Python-based diamond optical evaluation system called "QLé’»çŸ³å…‰å­¦èƒ½é‡åŒ–ç³»ç»Ÿ" (QL Diamond Optical Energy Quantification System). The conversation consists of only the initial request from the user followed by a previous summarization attempt. No actual implementation work has been performed yet.

## 2. Current Work:
No implementation work has been completed. The task was just assigned with the following strict requirements:

- **Baseline parameters must remain unchanged** and achieve full/perfect scores
- **Must run as local EXE** (standalone Windows executable)
- **100% functionality implementation** - no simplification allowed
- **Comprehensive upgrades needed** for both frontend and backend
- **Complete feature set** - all features must be fully implemented
- **Goal**: Create "the world's most perfect, strongest, and most precise model"

The source file referenced is located at `../ç«å±±æ–¹èˆŸå¤§æ¨¡å‹ä½“éªŒä¸­å¿ƒ-ç«å±±å¼•æ“_files/QLé’»çŸ³å…‰å­¦èƒ½é‡åŒ–ç³»ç»Ÿ_ç»ˆæä¿®å¤ç‰ˆ_backup.py`, which is outside the current working directory (AutoGPT-master).

## 3. Key Technical Concepts:
- **QL Diamond Optical Energy Quantification System**: Python-based diamond optical evaluation/grading system
- **Baseline parameters**: Critical parameters that must be preserved exactly and achieve perfect scores
- **Local EXE packaging**: System must be compilable to standalone Windows executable (likely using PyInstaller or similar)
- **Frontend/Backend architecture**: System has both UI components and backend logic requiring upgrades
- **Optical modeling**: Diamond light performance analysis (likely involving cut quality, brilliance, fire, scintillation metrics)

## 4. Relevant Files and Code:
- **File: `../ç«å±±æ–¹èˆŸå¤§æ¨¡å‹ä½“éªŒä¸­å¿ƒ-ç«å±±å¼•æ“_files/QLé’»çŸ³å…‰å­¦èƒ½é‡åŒ–ç³»ç»Ÿ_ç»ˆæä¿®å¤ç‰ˆ_backup.py`**
  - Primary source file to be analyzed and upgraded
  - Located outside current workspace directory
  - File contents have NOT been read yet
  - No modifications have been made
  - Name suggests this is an "ultimate repair version backup" of the system

## 5. Problem Solving:
No problems have been identified or solved yet. The conversation has only consisted of the user's initial request and a summarization task without any analysis or implementation work being performed.

## 6. Pending Tasks and Next Steps:
- **Task 1: Read and analyze the existing source code**
  - Next step: Read the file at `../ç«å±±æ–¹èˆŸå¤§æ¨¡å‹ä½“éªŒä¸­å¿ƒ-ç«å±±å¼•æ“_files/QLé’»çŸ³å…‰å­¦èƒ½é‡åŒ–ç³»ç»Ÿ_ç»ˆæä¿®å¤ç‰ˆ_backup.py`
  - Identify and document all baseline parameters
  - Catalog existing functionality for 100% preservation
  - Understand current frontend/backend architecture

- **Task 2: Design comprehensive upgrade plan**
  - Plan frontend UI/UX improvements
  - Plan backend algorithmic and structural enhancements
  - Design new features while ensuring no existing features are simplified
  - Ensure all changes maintain EXE packaging compatibility

- **Task 3: Implement upgrades**
  - Execute upgrades while preserving baseline parameters exactly
  - Verify all original functionality remains intact
  - Add enhanced features and capabilities
  - Test EXE execution capability

- **User's exact request (verbatim in Chinese):**
  > "åœ¨ä¸æ”¹å˜åŸºå‡†å‚æ•°çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰ä¿è¯å¯ä»¥æœ¬åœ°EXEè¿è¡Œçš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰ä¿è¯å…¨éƒ¨çš„åŠŸèƒ½è¦ç™¾åˆ†ç™¾çš„å®ç°è¿˜ä¸èƒ½ç®€åŒ–ï¼ŒåŸºå‡†å‚æ•°è¦å¾—æ»¡åˆ†ï¼Œä½ è¿˜è¦å…¨é¢çš„å¤§å‡çº§ï¼Œå‰ç«¯åç«¯éƒ½è¦å»å¤§å‡çº§ï¼Œè¦æŠŠåŠŸèƒ½åŠ çš„é½å…¨ï¼Œè¦å®ç°åŠŸèƒ½ç™¾åˆ†ç™¾çš„å…¨éƒ¨å®Œæˆï¼Œè¦åšä¸€ä¸ªå…¨ä¸–ç•Œæœ€å®Œç¾æœ€å¼ºæœ€ç²¾å¯†çš„æ¨¡å‹"

  Translation: "Without changing the baseline parameters, while ensuring local EXE execution, ensuring 100% implementation of all functionality without simplification, baseline parameters must achieve full marks, you must perform a comprehensive major upgrade, both frontend and backend need major upgrades, features must be complete, functionality must be 100% fully implemented, to create the world's most perfect, strongest, and most precise model"
